description: A colossal figure in a conductor's uniform angrily directs a minuscule man, carrying a bindle, to leave. The man walks away from train cars labeled "ACE TOYS". The extreme disparity in scale between the figures and the toy train cars creates a surreal depiction of authority confronting a transient, highlighting the absurdity of the encounter through exaggerated proportions.
caption: "And stay off!"

other_text.location: On the side of a train car
